metadata.Title: CVE-2018-18778 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - high.
metadata.Description: ACME mini_httpd before 1.30 lets remote users read arbitrary files. It was discovered that ACME mini_httpd did not properly handle HTTP GET requests with empty headers. A remote attacker could use this vulnerability to read arbitrary files.

criterions.comment: mini-httpd: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
